title: jordanw21
author: jordanw21
content: Another new crypto casino, where each player should be QA and report bugs to them.Casinos topic - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5465749.0This scam accusation was created because the casino won't close an account due to gambling addiction. It extremely hurts players like me. Because If I have a successful withdrawal in a casino, I'll dep there big sums soon and lose them. So this is their tactic - nobody can be self-excluded from their casinos. Why I think this is SCAM and huge RED FLAG:1) Their statement that you can self-exclude by yourself:https://i.gyazo.com/3b7793e99103f4d3064996f678dbfcb6.png2) You have that option but only for 24 hours - if you want more, you should wait that period and follow the link in the email. It looks like:https://i.gyazo.com/c26b0c33899f2d53636ffd1736b04b05.pngSo after cooling-off period, I played in that casino again. And in few hours followed that link but OOPS - doesn't work anymore. Another casino with technical glitches.https://i.gyazo.com/54c711d6d94a3e71de713b1d2528a1fb.mp43) Their tech support (not ordinary support) told that it'll be fixed in few days. In a few days, I can't confirm even 24-hours cooling-off period:https://i.gyazo.com/84606414ba7d9296e5ca69cfb50f6523.pngSo in the casino's opinion, I should give a damn about my self-exclusion and help them to do everything to fix that.For people who telling that this is not scam. IT IS SCAM, just look for some guy's complaining about same issue. But he lost his money already:https://casino.guru/coins-game-casino-player-s-account-was-not-closed

comments.author: God Of Thunder
comments.body: So, you decided to create a scam accusation thread? I thought the definition of a scam was something else. I thought players create scam accusation only if some platform confiscate their winnings and deposits or freeze their accounts. You can clearly see that they have a technical error and may need some time to fix it. But you are creating a scam accusation thread instead of cooperating with them. For now, try to stay away if possible and create another ticket requesting to close your account. I hope they will take care of it. @Little Mouse may be able to help you as well. Try contacting him.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Their self-exclusion rules state that you need to email support@coins.game and tell them for how long you want to be excluded. So do that. The screenshot you posted says that if the self-exclusion isn't completed in time, you will have to restart it. That means, you can't go back and click on the old link and expect it to work. You need to do the same steps that lead to you receiving the information in the self-exclusion email. Let me ask you something and try to answer honestly if you can. If and when you get excluded from Coins.Game, will you stop gambling forever?
